import random
import sys
def modulo(a, b, c):
    x = 1
    y = a
    while (b > 0):
            if (b % 2 == 1):
                    x = (x * y) % c
            y = (y * y) % c
            b >>= 1
    return x % c
 
def mulmod(a,b,c):
    x=0
    y=a%c
    while(b > 0):
        if(b%2 == 1):
            x = (x+y)%c
        y = (y*2)%c
        b >>= 1
    return x % c
 
def miller(p,iteration):
    if(p<2):
        return 0
    if(p!=2 and p%2==0):
        return 0
    s=p-1
    while(s%2==0):
        s>>=1
    i=0
    while(i<iteration):
        a=random.randrange(1,p)
        temp=s
        mod=modulo(a, temp, p)
        while(temp!=p-1 and mod!=1 and mod!=p-1):
            mod=mulmod(mod,mod,p)
            temp <<= 1
        if(mod!=p-1 and temp%2==0):
            return 0
        i+=1
    return 1
n=input()
if(miller(n,1)):
    print "PRIME"
else:
    print "COMPOSITE"
